price: 4. Sungguh, Kami telah mengetahui apa yang ditelan oleh bumi dari (tubuh) mereka, sebab pada Kami ada kitab (catatan) yang terpelihara dengan baik.
arabic: قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مِنۡهُمۡۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَٰبٌ حَفِيظُۢ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qad ʿalim'nā mā tanquṣu al-arḍu min'hum waʿindanā kitābun ḥafīẓun
